about_hero_title: Your Unforgettable Journey in Georgia Starts Here
about_hero_subtitle: We are "Mood Maker" - your personal guides to the heart and soul of Georgia.
about_story:
Art critic, sommelier, wine guide, gastronomic guide, restaurateur, bartender, blogger.

Teacher, coach and creator of good mood.

I am ready to organize your adventure in Georgia according to your mood and taste.

Provide and recommend information about restaurants, bars, hotels, wineries, wines, food, videographers and photographers.

Our team cares about your mood.
about_passion_text: We do this out of love for our country. Every tour is filled with personal stories and genuine enthusiasm.
about_small_groups_text: We keep our groups small to ensure a personal, friendly atmosphere where real connections are made.
about_authentic_text: Forget the tourist traps. We take you to the hidden gems where you can experience the real Georgian culture.
about_review_1_text: "The whole holiday went great, we are extremely happy!"
about_review_2_text: "Our honeymoon was unforgettable, all thanks to the organization of the agency."
about_review_3_text: "Thank you! We remembered every moment, we would go there again right now!"
about_cta_title: Ready to Create Your Own Story?
about_cta_subtitle: Let's plan your perfect Georgian adventure together.
destinations_hero_subtitle: Find the perfect journey that matches your spirit. Your unforgettable Georgian adventure starts here.
profile_login_prompt: Please log in to see your profile.
alert_password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters.
alert_password_update_fail: Error: Please sign out and sign in again to change password.
login_to_book_prompt: Please Sign In to book this tour.
special_tours_hero_subtitle: Unique experiences crafted just for you.
